bibl.title: Kasion, Kasiotes and Kasiotikos.
bibl.note: Mount Kasion is a small hill near lake Serbonis on the shore of the Mediterranean, some 54 km east of Pelousion. Discusses the meaning of the adjectives Kasiotes and Kasiotikos, used to qualify boats, mirrors, construction activities, clothes and knots.
bibl.seg: VERRETH Herbert, Kasion, Kasiotes and Kasiotikos.

Mount Kasion is a small hill near lake Serbonis on the shore of the Mediterranean, some 54 km east of Pelousion. Discusses the meaning of the adjectives Kasiotes and Kasiotikos, used to qualify boats, mirrors, construction activities, clothes and knots.
